name: Sandnya Sanwardhan Sanstha

address: Sawarkar Nagar Bus Stop, Khamla Road

briefDescription: SSS is a non profit organization committed to the noble cause of mentally challenged.We have been providing leadership in the field of special education, vocational training and rehabilitation of mentally disabled. Additionally we provide adjunct services like physiotherapy, occupational therapy, speech therapy, music therapy,hydro therapy, counselling services etc. Apart from this we undertake public awareness programmes on large scale in rural and urban areas where in tell people about causes of mental retardation and its prevention.
